definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

sentences.english: It would do painstaking research on topics like Guantanamo, and then issue reports.
sentences.chinese: 它会做像关塔那摩主题的潜心研究，然后发出报告。

sentences.english: I will close the Guantanamo Bay prison and ban torture.
sentences.chinese: 我会关闭关塔那摩基地监狱，禁止刑讯拷打。

sentences.english: One hundred seventy-six inmates remain at the U.S. prison in Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.
sentences.chinese: 美国在古巴关塔那摩的监狱里仍有176名囚犯。

sentences.english: The military tribunals in Guantánamo have evoked little public interest.
sentences.chinese: 关塔那摩的军事法庭很少引起公众的关注。

sentences.english: America's claim to Puerto Rico and Guantanamo Bay count among the war's legacies.
sentences.chinese: 美国要求把从波多黎各到关塔那摩算作是战争的遗产。
现在关在关塔那摩监狱。

sentences.english: He says they don't have a clear plan for closing Gitmo.
sentences.chinese: 他说他们在关闭关塔那摩这件事上没有清晰的计划。

sentences.english: The rapid closure of Guantánamo Bay would be a good start.
sentences.chinese: 即刻关闭关塔那摩监狱将会是一个好的开始。

sentences.english: He says they don't have a clear plan for closing Gitmo. That's what Cheney says to the Obama Administration.
sentences.chinese: 他说他们在关闭关塔那摩这件事上没有清晰的计划。

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]

pinyin: Sa4 da2 mu3 · Hou2 sai4 yin1

definition: San Juan, capital of Puerto Rico
Puerto Rico, self-governing unincorporated territory of the United States
